Answer to the Most Illustrious and Most Excellent Sir

On the 29th of last month, the official letter and decree addressed to Your Excellency came into my hands. Your Excellency, Your Excellency, Most Excellent Sir João Manuel de Lima e Silva, to whom, with the same regret that now accompanies me, I found myself obliged to refuse such a request, which is so justly made for the security of the proclaimed system. I have goods, some of which I have already provided, as Your Excellency

May God keep Your Excellency  
Fazenda do Salso, July 1, 1837  
Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães

[On leaf 1v. of document CV-212]
